title: Currently Working On
synopsis: Here is a list of [[Recent Changes]] I consider important. View our experiments on the [[Scratch]] page. To clear stuff saved in your browser try [[Local Changes]].

title: Livecode and Javascript
synopsis: This site is about the interaction between the [[Livecode]] programming language [[LiveScript]] and the [[Javascript]] languages.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site [[Livecode and Javascript]]. See [[Recent Changes]] or [[Changes to this Site]], to find out what we are [[Currently Working On]].

title: HTML5 Deployment
synopsis: With LiveCode 8's HTML5 deployment capability, you can now run applications written in LiveCode in any web browser that supports JavaScript and HTML5.
